word:
Chap. 186 - To. W. W. Prescott and wife

                           "Sunnyside," Cooranbong, Sept. 1, 1896. 
                                                        P-88-1896 

Dear brother and sister Prescott:- 
     Today I was informed that the paper states that the steamer for Africa leaves tomorrow. I shall send you some enclosures, but I am sorry that I did not learn sooner that the boat was to leave tomorrow.
